duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement new and modify existing engineered labor standards in warehouse operations.
Train warehouse and delivery staff in efficient work methods and maintain work methods.
Perform process simulations and serve as a subject matter expert in work methods and labor management software.
Monitor and analyze warehouse and delivery operations to measure productivity and identify new opportunities for efficiencies.
Maintain high-level relations with vendors throughout the implementation process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, required (Industrial Engineering degree preferred).
